original_title: Lamentations: A Monument to the Dead World, Part 1: The Dream of the Last Historian
overview: Like Ezekiel's vision in the valley of the dry bones, a typos of a new beginning. In among all the feelings of loss and deprivation there occur intimations of final culbute général, of the dissolution of time, of a now that vanishes between the no long and the not yet.
title: Lamentations: A Monument to the Dead World, Part 1: The Dream of the Last Historian
